00013     
00014 // maximum time out time is used as default time out parameter
00015 static const unsigned int MAXIMUM_TIMEOUT = 1200; // 20 min
00016 // update each 3 microsec
00017 static const unsigned int MICROSEC_UPDATE = 3; // 20 min
00018 // time to update stage in microseconds
00019 static const uint64_t UPDATE_STAGE = 100000;
00020 // pause to give thread some time
00021 static const uint64_t MIN_PAUSE_NANO_SEC = 10;
00025 struct OperationStage {
00026     enum Enum {
00027         UNDEFINED = 0,
00028         CONFIG,
00029         READY,
00030         INITDONE,
00031         RUN,
00032         PAUSE
00033     };
00039     static std::string toString(Enum stage)
00040     {
00041         switch (stage) {
00042         case CONFIG:
00043             return "CONFIG";
00044         case READY:
00045             return "READY";
00046         case INITDONE:
00047             return "INITDONE";
00048         case RUN:
00049             return "RUN";
00050         case PAUSE:
00051             return "PAUSE";
00052         default:
00053             return "UNDEFINED";
00054         }
00055     }
00056 };
00057 
00061 class IVtdApi
00062 {
00063     public:
00064 
00068         struct OperationMode
00069         {
00070             enum Enum
00071             {
00072                 UNSET = 0,
00073                 PREPARATION,
00074                 OPERATION
00075             };
00076 
00082             static std::string toString(Enum mode) {
00083                 switch(mode) {
00084                 case UNSET:
00085                     return "unset";
00086                 case OPERATION:
00087                     return "operation";
00088                 case PREPARATION:
00089                     return "preparation";
00090                 }
00091                 return "unknown";
00092         }
00093     };
00094 
00098     struct Protocol
00099     {
00100         enum Enum {
00101             SCP = 0
00102             , RDB_TCP
00103             , RDB_UDP
00104             , RDB_UDP_SEND_ONLY
00105             , RDB_UDP_RECEIVE_ONLY
00106         };
00107     };
00108 
00112     struct PlayerControl
00113     {
00114         enum Enum {
00115             INTERNAL = 0,
00116             EXTERNAL
00117         };
00118 
00124         static std::string toString(Enum control) {
00125             switch(control) {
00126             case INTERNAL:
00127                 return "internal";
00128             case EXTERNAL:
00129                 return "external";
00130             }
00131             return "unknown";
00132         }
00133     };
00134 
00138     struct PlayerCategory
00139     {
00140         enum Enum {
00141             VEHICLE = 0,
00142             PEDESTRIAN,
00143             OBJECT
00144         };
00145 
00151         static std::string toString(Enum category) {
00152             switch(category) {
00153             case VEHICLE:
00154                 return "vehicle";
00155             case PEDESTRIAN:
00156                 return "pedestrian";
00157             case OBJECT:
00158                 return "object";
00159             }
00160             return "unknown";
00161         }
00162     };
00163 
00167     struct SetEntity {
00168         enum Enum
00169         {
00170             SCENARIOEDITOR = 0,
00171             PLAYER,
00172             TRAFFIC,
00173             SOUND,
00174             IMAGEGENERATOR,
00175             TASKCONTROL,
00176             DYNAMICS,
00177             RDBLOG,
00178             ODRGATEWAY
00179         };
00180 
00186         static std::string toString(Enum entity)
00187         {
00188             switch (entity)
00189             {
00190             case DYNAMICS:
00191                 return "dynamics";
00192             case IMAGEGENERATOR:
00193                 return "imageGenerator";
00194             case ODRGATEWAY:
00195                 return "odrGateway";
00196             case PLAYER:
00197                 return "player";
00198             case RDBLOG:
00199                 return "RDBlog";
00200             case SCENARIOEDITOR:
00201                 return "scenarioEditor";
00202             case SOUND:
00203                 return "sound";
00204             case TASKCONTROL:
00205                 return "taskControl";
00206             case TRAFFIC:
00207                 return "traffic";
00208             }
00209 
00210             return "unknown";
00211         }
00212     };
